price: 84.Tokkel ken maaluu kee ken kalqootay qaleelat urak (orak) sugeeni keenih xiqtem mali Yallih digaalak.
arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
